All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.Scrollable, java.io.Serializable
public class JColoredTextArea
extends javax.swing.JTextArea

Superclass of swing JTextArea. Uses colorer library to make syntax highlighting. http://colorer.sf.net/

chooseFileType

public void chooseFileType(java.lang.String filename)
Selects and installs coloring style (filetype) according to filename string and current first line of text.

Parameters:
filename - File name to be used to autodetect filetype
